subtitle: A good way of using up stale or left-over bread. Replace the white bread with brown if liked.

method.text: Butter the slices of bread. Cut each slice in half diagonally. Layer with the orange segments and kiwi slices in a 600 ml / 1 pt ovenproof dish.

Warm the milk in a small pan until almost boiling and pour over the beaten egg, whisking constantly. Strain and carefully pour over the bread and fruit. Sprinkle over the sugar and pine nuts and leave to stand for 30 min.
Bake in oven for 30-40 min or until set.

title: Fruit bread pudding
